2020-03-26 16:56
"Rendering" - what's that? There are various terms which convey how we generate HTML or manipulate the DOM. And they can be confusing. I spent a couple of minutes of this @freeCodeCamp video on JAMstack to describe some popular terms for rendering. https://t.co/tlIpGd1LMF https://t.co/eEnkEHIzaj

Replying to @BrettStark 2020-03-21 19:11
@BrettStark @freeCodeCamp Hi Brett! Note that the src path to the js is ‚Äú/js/vibe.js‚Äù. Since that‚Äôs root relative, a browser will not find it if the index file is just opened from the file system. (It would if the path was ‚Äú./js/vibe.js‚Äù) But ‚Äúnpm start‚Äù will serve it all up for you with a local server.
